name: Save and close
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

Your online ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)) has been saved.

Sign back in and continue with your application: ((signin url))

Your application will be saved for 6 months.

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)) has been saved
